job_purpose: Join a dynamic team for an exciting project on an app used by over 2 million Australians, focusing on extending front-end applications for iOS and Android.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Collaborate with the team to extend and enhance front-end applications for iOS and Android platforms.
Implement video functionality and ensure seamless integration of content from the CMS.
Identify and address issues early to prevent escalation.
Contribute to high-quality and user-friendly feature delivery in a fast-paced environment.
required_qualifications: Minimum of 2 years of hands-on experience in React development.
Strong problem-solving skills and a can-do attitude.
Ability to work well within a team and integrate seamlessly.
Proactive in issue identification and resolution.
preferred_qualifications: Experience with other frameworks in addition to React.
company_name: Confidential (Company Name not provided in job description)
company_details: Be part of a high-growth project for an app used by over 2 million Australians. Collaborate with a talented and diverse team in an innovative, supportive environment where your contributions directly impact the app’s success.
